channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-10521] Add handling for swallowed InterruptedException thrown by Thread.sleep in RpcServer
item.description: A sub-task of HBASE-10497
item.summary: Add handling for swallowed InterruptedException thrown by Thread.sleep in RpcServer

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: new patch rebased to latest RpcClient code made by Nicolas Liochon in HBASE-10490

-1 overall. Here are the results of testing the latest attachment
http://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12628927/HBASE-10521-trunk_v2.patch
against trunk revision .
ATTACHMENT ID: 12628927

+1 @author. The patch does not contain any @author tags.

-1 tests included. The patch doesn't appear to include any new or modified tests.
Please justify why no new tests are needed for this patch.
Also please list what manual steps were performed to verify this patch.

+1 hadoop1.0. The patch compiles against the hadoop 1.0 profile.

+1 hadoop1.1. The patch compiles against the hadoop 1.1 profile.

+1 javadoc. The javadoc tool did not generate any warning messages.

+1 javac. The applied patch does not increase the total number of javac compiler warnings.

+1 findbugs. The patch does not introduce any new Findbugs (version 1.3.9) warnings.

+1 release audit. The applied patch does not increase the total number of release audit warnings.

+1 lineLengths. The patch does not introduce lines longer than 100

-1 site. The patch appears to cause mvn site goal to fail.

+1 core tests. The patch passed unit tests in .

This message is automatically generated.
ping Nicolas Liochon

For RpcServer#Listener#run, we could just log and return, no? This will stop the thread cleanly.
In RpcServer#Reader#doRunLoop we shallow the interruption
In RpcServer#Responder#doRunLoop we can do a return or a break as well (see the case of an exception coming from waitPending today: we take into account this exception, as it's caught and it terminates the thread cleanly)
v3 patch attached per Nicolas Liochon's latest review feedback on v2, thanks!

I will also change the log level from warning to info or debug during commit.
